title: Bandelier National Monument: Bandelier Rocks
body: Bandelier Rocks         The San Miguel Mountains on the park's western boundary represent another episode of volcanism in the park's history. photo by sally king  There are four main rock types found in Bandelier. Click on each rock type below to find out more about it and what that type of rock was used for by the Ancestral Pueblo people. Basalt Pumice Obsidian Tuff Some less local rocks were also important. Fibrolite
